description: The Hatchling Sneak is a small, reptilian creature that relies on its agility and cunning to ambush its prey. It has sleek, dark scales that allow it to blend into shadows effortlessly, making it a feared predator in dense forests and cavernous areas.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The Hatchling Sneak has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.description: While in dim light or darkness, the Hatchling Sneak can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+3 piercing damage.

actions.name: Poison Spray
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute.
